title:Dreaming City

// Waking Vigil (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,3161816588,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,3161816588,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,3161816588,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,2846385770,47981717

// Waking Vigil (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,247725512,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,247725512,1683379515
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1561002382,247725512,1546637391

// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.

// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:pve

dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1561002382,3436462433,1015611457


// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1561002382,247725512,2848615171

// Waking Vigil (pvp)
//notes: PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,3161816588,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,3161816588,1015611457

// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:pve

// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=247725512,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=247725512,1683379515
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=247725512,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=247725512,1015611457

// Waking Vigil (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090094,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090095,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090093,1015611457


// Waking Vigil (pvp)
//notes: PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090092,1015611457

Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.

// Sleepless (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hard/Quick Launch/(Volatile/Confined Launch for minimal velocity) + High Velocity/(Any but High Velocity for minimal velocity) + Tracking + Chain/Vorpal/Unrelenting
Unrelenting takes 2 kills to proc, so you could get lucky off a multi kill.
Lower velocity results in better tracking. tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3740842661&perks=1478423395,1996142143,3977735242,3108830275
dimwishlist:item=3740842661&perks=1478423395,1996142143,3977735242,2396489472

// Sleepless (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hard/Quick Launch/(Volatile/Confined Launch for minimal velocity) + High Velocity/(Any but High Velocity for minimal velocity) + Tracking + Chain/Vorpal/Unrelenting

Lower velocity results in better tracking. tags:god-pvp

// Sleepless (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hard/Quick Launch/(Volatile/Confined Launch for minimal velocity) + High Velocity/(Any but High Velocity for minimal velocity) + Tracking + Chain/Vorpal/Unrelenting
Unrelenting takes 2 kills to proc, so you could get lucky off a multi kill.
Lower velocity results in better tracking. tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=3740842661&perks=1996142143,3977735242,3108830275
dimwishlist:item=3740842661&perks=1996142143,3977735242,2396489472

// Sleepless (pve)
//notes: PvE: Hard/Quick Launch + Impact/Alloy Casing + Fieldprep/ALH + Chain/Demo
PvP: Hard/Quick Launch/(Volatile/Confined Launch for minimal velocity) + High Velocity/(Any but High Velocity for minimal velocity) + Tracking + Chain/Vorpal/Unrelenting
Unrelenting takes 2 kills to proc, so you could get lucky off a multi kill.
Lower velocity results in better tracking. tags:pve
